Html:
Hi PHPExcel,

Im currently getting the hang of PHPExcel now and are looking to progress with some idea, Here is what I want to do...

When Im uploading stock to our company we heavily use spreadsheets and formulas, heres my idea.

The spreadsheet I design I would like to put online, as in when I follow the domain 'Domain.com/upload' it will load in the browser this template.

From there I can edit the spreadsheet, and then when saving it will export to a PHPexcel behaviour?

Does this make sense Im just brainstorming, imagine google docs, but using phpexcel (for internal use keeping away of external services)

then to export use PHP to gather the data.

Thanks for your time
Adam
